entityType.description: The type of the menu component described by this JSON object

name.description: A descriptive identifier for the menu item

guid.description: The unique identifier for the menu item, assigned by the Toast POS

description.description: A written description of the menu item

sku.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) for the menu item

plu.description: The price look-up (PLU) code for the menu item

price.description: The price of the menu item

idString.description: This field is for Toast internal use only

calories.description: The number of calories in the menu item

imageLink.description: A URL to an image located on Amazon S3

unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for the menu item

orderableOnline.description: Indicates whether the menu item is available for online ordering

visibility.description: Indicates where the menu item is displayed and who can see it

date.description: Date folder name from SFTP path

menu_guid.description: Unique identifier for the parent menu

group_guid.description: Unique identifier for the parent menu group
